OOC: I wish Lurker the best. Let him know that he's always welcome here no =
matter what. I understand if he needs to get away for a few days or weeks o=
r so, too.

Message to Lurker: MECCA!...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
 From: 1641coburn@... 
  To: dbzsf@yahoogroups.com ; nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com ; DragonballRessurection@yahoogroups.com ; The_Untold_Chapter@yahoogr=
oups.com ; creatureflare@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, September 03, 200=
1 7:27 AM
  Subject: [dbzsf] Lurker will be back


  To Lurker's RPGs,
    =
      This is Michael's brother, but Michael's probably better known as Lur=
ker, from what I've seen.  I am sending this letter to let you all know tha=
t recently, Lurker has been having tough times.  His girlfriend broke up wi=
th him, whom he will never forget, and other personal matters have been hap=
pening, and he hasn't been the same.  This morning, I found him in his room=
 with a knife, and he had threatened to kill himself, but inisisted that he=
 loved you all too much to go.  He may come on tonight, but if not, he'll p=
robably come on tomorrow or the day after, somewhere around there.  As his =
brother, I ask that when he does come back, please don't be too hard on him=
, he has it hard enough as it is.  Lurker also said that you guys can make =
him feel much better.  
   
                                               =
                                           Sincerely,    David Coburn
   
 =
  
  P.S. Roland, Lurker wanted me to pass this on to you:  "CHEESE!"

    =
    Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              ADVERTISEMENT
             
      =
 
       

  To unsubscribe, send an e-mail to:
  dbzsf-unsubscribe@egroups=
.com



  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Servi=
ce.
